title: Waiting for my Project Sweater :P
body: Does anybody knwo the date they are being shiped out? The project sweater that is {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
I guess you need to be a little bit more patient.

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/landing/2016/project
"This version of the PROJECT: Hoodie is only available via PROJECT: Merch Quest. Once you've completed the quest, you'll have until 8/31/16 to pre-order. Hoodie priced at $45. Estimated ship date: October 2016"
Been pretty patient and now it's November 30 with no word of when it will arrive. :/
December 3rd and no word ... come on rito please
I haven't gotten any date either...
I opened a ticket and they said because of hurricane matthew shipping is delayed. Still waiting
Yea they sent me to the forum that says they're gonna start shipping them out mid November. Possibly looks like Maybe End of Nov or Early Dec?
Your hear anything about the sweaters? Nothing here.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Mine got shipped out. Did yours?
No it did not.  I opened a ticket yesterday
Any updates for the sweaters for you? I haven't received anything.
Yup, as *Hyperion* mentioned, this item should be shipping out sometime this month if all goes according to schedule. If you don't see a shipping update after October goes by, please let me know.
It is November 3rd and I havent received a shipping update...any ideas?

We sent out a shipping address confirmation email that you should have received by now. If you didn't get that email, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist you further.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eILlMgEW,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-03T22:14:18.945+0000)
>
> We sent out a shipping address confirmation email that you should have received by now. If you didn't get that email, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll assist you further.

its November 13th for me and i still have no received a single thing my order still says processing payment. This thing is like over a month late and at this point im probably not even going to get it until December  :/
